name: AudioUnitMeterClipping
desc: Audio clipping that has occurred in a mixer unit.

items.name: init(peakValueSinceLastCall: Float32, sawInfinity: DarwinBoolean, sawNotANumber: DarwinBoolean)
var peakValueSinceLastCall: Float32
items.desc: The maximum value seen on the channel since the last time the property was retrieved.

items.name: var sawInfinity: DarwinBoolean
items.desc: TRUE if there was an infinite value on this channel since the last time the property was retrieved.

items.name: var sawNotANumber: DarwinBoolean
items.desc: TRUE if there was a floating point “not a number” value on this channel since the last time the property was retrieved.
